channel.title: Virus or what?
channel.description: Might be a trojan, but I torrented call of duty 4 from pirate bay and after it torrented, few days later I extracted it then installed the bat file and it then downloaded the application for single player and multiplayer, but everytime I tried to play sp or mp after 30 seconds or so it will shut down my computer, me thinking it was the key code I searched the web for key codes but couldn't find a single one so then carried on private match and it kept doing the same thing. I thought if I kept trying it might just magically work after some time but then it got to a point where everytime I try to turn my computer on it gets up to the command prompt bit and then I i've clicked both start windows normally and run some sort of system repair. But neither work. Any ideas?

item.title: Virus or what?
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“jmood128, post:8, topic:341236”]Make sure to backed up your java.client, it could be an attempt by Silab trying to connect to you over the internet. :eek:

Just do at they say, and make sure your java is good. :)[/quote]
LOL!!! I love you <3. Protect thy java at all cost!

Read full topic

item.title: Virus or what?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Make sure to backed up your java.client, it could be an attempt by Silab trying to connect to you over the internet. :eek:

Just do at they say, and make sure your java is good.

item.title: Virus or what?
item.dc:creator: @riku9182 riku9182
item.description:
@riku9182 wrote:

This happened to me one time, except it was on RuneScape O.o
Right after my account got hacked, Every time I tryed to go to the “PassWord Change” section
it would auto shut my comp down
Wierd eh?

Also, use Piriform CCleaner and HiJackThis, after you install HJT, run the scanner with a logfile, then post the logfile on here, and I’ll scan it.

item.title: Virus or what?
item.dc:creator: @abraham2119 abraham2119

@abraham2119 wrote:

you are a turd for being that vulnerable to infections

boot into safe mode, check the start folders and the registry for any unknown apps and get avast

item.title: Virus or what?
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Might be a trojan, but I torrented call of duty 4 from pirate bay and after it torrented, few days later I extracted it then installed the bat file and it then downloaded the application for single player and multiplayer, but everytime I tried to play sp or mp after 30 seconds or so it will shut down my computer, me thinking it was the key code I searched the web for key codes but couldn’t find a single one so then carried on private match and it kept doing the same thing. I thought if I kept trying it might just magically work after some time but then it got to a point where everytime I try to turn my computer on it gets up to the command prompt bit and then I i’ve clicked both start windows normally and run some sort of system repair. But neither work. Any ideas?
